data.actual_result: The first letter of the sentence doesn't get capitalised
data.expected_result: The first letter of the word should be capitalised at the start of a sentence.
data.short_description: Auto-capitalise doesn't auto-capitalise in Channel Topic and Notes
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: Enable Auto-Capitalisation in Settings> General> Keyboard - Go to a server you have manage channels permission and open the channel setting by holding on a channel - Tap on the Channel Topic Field. - Type some text, and some punctuations etc. - Similarly, open a profile of a user and type in some text in the Note field
